title: PBE Account
body:
Hi!

I have got 2 questions when you can answer me whrite it  please.
So i want to be a "PBE tester" but i don't know how :(
You can send me the registrer link and the download link?

Thanks.

replies.body: You can signup for the PBE [here](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  I recommend checking out our [PBE guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) for more information on how to sign and get into the PBE!  Good luck!
